SELECT DISTINCT SPID spId, BIZCODE bizCode, SERVNAME servName FROM (SELECT SPID, BIZCODE, SERVNAME FROM DDSMPSPBIZINFO WHERE SPID = #SPID# AND SERVNAME LIKE #SERVNAME# AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(VALIDDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(EXPIREDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
UNION ALL
SELECT SP_CODE SPID, OPER_CODE BIZCODE, OPER_NAME SERVNAME FROM CFG_SP_OPER_INFO WHERE SP_CODE = #SPID# AND OPER_NAME LIKE #SERVNAME# AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') BETWEEN OPER_VALID_DATE AND OPER_EXPIRE_DATE)
